name: Use Axe On Fish
description:
GAME IS OPTIMIZED FOR DOWNLOAD PLAY, BUT AVAILABLE FOR BROWSER PLAY. GRAPHICAL GLITCHES MAY OCCUR IN BROWSER PLAY.

Use Axe on Fish... Or, Use Sandwich on Lock? One of these must work..

A game for Ludum Dare 47: Stuck in a Loop

ChangeLog:

  • v1.01 (6/10/2020): Slowed camera a touch. Fixed cursor not appearing on main menu.
  • v1.02 (7/10/2020): Fixed cursor not appearing in some browsers in WebGL version.
